file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.2"
info:
  title: HSE REST API
  version: "2.1"
  description: API description for the HSE REST server.
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: "http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"
paths:
  /kvdb/{alias}/home:
    summary: Get the home directory for a KVDB.
    description: This is a description.
    parameters:
      - $ref: "#/components/parameters/aliasParam"
    get:
      description: Get KVDB home.
      tags:
        - kvdb
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              example: /var/lib/hse/kvdb0
              schema:
                type: string
          description: OK
components:
  parameters:
    aliasParam:
      name: alias
      in: path
      required: true
      description: REST alias for a KVDB
      example: 0
      schema:
        type: integer
        format: int32
